item.title: Paper recying bank damaged, 13th December
item.description:
The opening on both sides of this paper recycling bank is broken and blocking the bank mouth. Consequently I've noticed the bank is used less than the others and resulting in the two blue open paper bins being piled high.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Adelaide Road, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Request For Street Leaf Clearance, 13th December
item.description:
Dear Bromley Council team, I am writing to ask whether it would be possible for the fallen leaves on our street to be cleared more thoroughly. While I understand that leaf clearance is an ongoing task during autumn, it is now December and the trees have largely finished shedding their leaves. At present, a significant amount of wet leaves remains on the pavement and road, which can become slippery and potentially hazardous for pedestrians and drivers, particularly in colder and wetter conditions. I would be grateful if this could be looked into and if a more complete clean-up could be scheduled when convenient. Thank you very much for your time and for the work the council does to keep our streets safe and well maintained.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Overbury Avenue, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
